AQMmBA.en: Do you wanna make a Snow Flower?~ It can be a bou-quet!!~

AgMmBA.en: It will be me-morable! And lo-ving! What do you say?~!?

AwMmBA.en:
[Winter]
You've a bit underleveled. Please come back when you're level 50 to withstand the harsh winter of the snow flower festival!

BAMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Get yourself a sweater for this cold weather!

BQMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Hello! Thank you very much for joining today's snow flower festival!

BgMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Although winter is cold, it always feels romantic! Snowflakes, a warm fire place, gift exchanges, colorful lights...

BwMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Today is particularly freezing. We will be so happy to have a snowfall today. However, Aldebaran haven't hasn't had any snow. Ever.

CAMmBA.en: Wow, will we still have a snow flower festival?

CQMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Yup! A Snow flower festival without snow! Aldebaran is famous for it! The festival continues for celebrating our heroes and the desire for snow.

CgMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Many visitors think it's weird for attending a snow flower festival without any snow, but it became one of the best winter festivals in Rune Midgard!.

CwMmBA.en:
[Winter]
During the festival, you can experience making a bouquet of snow flowers like ^0000CDMake snow flower bouquet^000000.

DQMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Also, while we wait for the snow fall,You can experience the^0000CDFind for white cotton event^000000and ^0000CDWord card^000000 and exchange for gifts that we prepared.

DgMmBA.en:
[Winter]
How is it? Will you join us in the festivities and  participate in Aldebaran snow flower festival?

DwMmBA.en: I would love to attend snow flower festival!

EAMmBA.en: I have question about snow flower festival.

EgMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Then, I recommend making a ^0000CDSnow flower bouquet^000000. This is what the festival is all about!

FAMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Siromas disappear by leaving a white crystal called a snow flower .People from past started to raise Siromas' to harvest them for snow.

FQMmBA.en:
[Winter]
However, there was little knowledge about the unknown creature. In return, the number of Siroma dramatically increased.

FgMmBA.en:
[Winter]
At the right time, heroes emerged at once and defeated Siromas. The morning that countless Siromas disappeared from Aldebaran, what was left were countless snow flowers that sparkled like the snow.

FwMmBA.en:
[Winter]
There was an enormous development through desperate experiments that was different from unskilled control over spell and raising creatures.

GAMmBA.en:
[Winter]
The Snow boy, Siromas, is spread throughout the continent only during the festival period.

GQMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Collect the snow flower that the snow boys drop and return it for bouquet.

HgMmBA.en: Bouquet? Isn't it a snow person...?

HwMmBA.en:
[Winter]
It is a snow flower bouquet because it is banded together with a snow flower. It's pun but isn't it fun?!

IAMmBA.en:
[Winter]
We make a snowman to remember the heroes who defeated Siromas during that one night every year.

IQMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Defeat the Snow boy and collect ^0000CD10^000000 Magical Snow Flowers. The illusionist will celebrate this festival by making a bouquet by banding the collected snow flowers together.

IgMmBA.en:
[Winter]
You must be curious about Aldebaran's snow flower festival.

IwMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Snow flower festival, the best winter festival in Rune Midgard, started with the desire for snow.

JAMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Different from Luti which snows for all year, Aldebaran people have done everything to get snow artificially.

JQMmBA.en:
[Winter]
They have tried by sprinkling grinded ice and using spells but all those methods had side effects which instantly ended the attempts.

JgMmBA.en:
[Winter]
However, the craving for snow never stopped and they started to gather Siroma to raise them for snow.

JwMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Siroma population dramatically increased when they moved from a severe cold cave to mild weather in Aldebaran.

KAMmBA.en:
[Winter]
When the raising farm was not able to fullfill all Siromas due to dramatic increase in number, they fled from the farm and ate everything they saw.

KQMmBA.en:
[Winter]
The people of Aldebaran encountered terror. They started to pack and fled from town due to the fear.

KgMmBA.en:
[Winter]
The day before fleeing from town...people were full of sorrow before the night ended. And the next day... all people who came out from their door were surprised.

KwMmBA.en:
[Winter]
All Siromas disappeared during the night. People tried to find them from all over the town but only white colored powder was on all over the road.

LAMmBA.en:
[Winter]
People were confused. All Siromas are gone in one night?? All secrets are revealed by some children.

LQMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Those children were very sad about leaving town with all memorable momments so they've gathered in old house's storage to talk about old memories all night.

LgMmBA.en:
[Winter]
When the night started, there was short disturbance and Siroma's sound started to cutback. Children started to see outside through windown and crack between doors.

LwMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Suddenly, 4 people appeared from no where and started to defeat Siromas with ease. Spots of Sirama was left with a white snow flower that twinkles all day.

MAMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Children say that the 4 strangers were brothers and sisters. All of them wore the same outfit and had similar looks.

MQMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Those brothers and sisters cleared the Siroma and disappeared into the night.

MgMmBA.en:
[Winter]
When whole story was shared throughout the town, people of Aldebaran started to make a snow man with the snow flowers left from Siromas. The snow which they desperately desired.

MwMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Ever since then, people made snowmen with snow flowers from Siromas to remember and celebrate the 4 strangers who saved and brought peace to the town every year.

NAMmBA.en:
[Winter]
This is origin of Aldebaran's snow flower festival.

NQMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Okay. Take care during the winter period, The festival will continue till end of the month so you can come back anytime during the period to attend the festival!

NgMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Have you collected a magical snow flower?

OAMmBA.en:
[Marine]
Now its my turn? Please turn in the collected magical snow flower to me. I will make snow flower bouquet.

PQMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Snow flower bouquet got stronger with magical snow flower's power. We would like to share this strength with you but which power you wish to receive? There are 4 kinds of different strength so please be wise.

PgMmBA.en:
[Winter]
^0000CDSnow^000000
Recover HP 5%, increase HIT+30 for 10 minutes

PwMmBA.en:
^0000CDWinter^000000
Recover HP 5%, increase ATK+3% for 10 minutes

QAMmBA.en:
^0000CDPestie^000000
Recover HP 5%, increase attack speed for 10 minutes
(decrease delay by 10% after attack)

QQMmBA.en:
^0000CDFlora^000000
Recover HP 5%, increase MATK+3% for 10 minutes

RgMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Oh, you should not sit but stand still to receive the power.

TgMmBA.en:
[Winter]
And this is souvenir we have prepared for the festival. Now please enjoy this wonderful snow flower festival! We have other event as well so please take a look into it!

UAMmBA.en:
[Winter]
If Winter says, it all alright.

UQMmBA.en: If Winter says, it all alright.

UgMmBA.en:
[Winter]
This is the souvenir we have prepared for the festival. Now please enjoy this wonderful snow flower festival! We have other event as well so please take a look into it!

VwMmBA.en:
[Flora]
Lovely snow flower, its so beautiful!

WAMmBA.en: ovely snow flower, its so beautiful!

WQMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Hmmm.. This is not enough. At least ^0000CD10^000000 Magical Snow Flowers are needed so snowman cannot melt and be solid.

WgMmBA.en:
[Winter]
^0000CD Get 10^000000 magical snow flower from snow boy.

WwMmBA.en:
[Winter]
We have prepared other events so please take a look into it

XAMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Even though snow doesn't fall in Aldebaran we have the most fun snow flower festival! When the festival ends, snowmen are moved to Rutie so please don't worry.

XQMmBA.en:
[Winter]
Even snow doesn't fall in Aldebaran we have the most fun snow flower festival!

YQMmBA.en: Do you like cold? I really like it!

YwMmBA.en: Fun winter~ Nice to meet you!

ZQMmBA.en: Even I've never seen snow, I really like it.

ZwMmBA.en: If you bring magical snow flower, we will share magical power and gifts.

aAMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
ah? the load seems to be too heavy!! please be lighter.

aQMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
Hello! Even snow does not fall in Aldebaran, you can still feel the winter without it. You can enjoy winter in many ways!

agMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
I am frp, Aldebaran who researched about snow for 300 years! Illusionist who makes fake snow that looks like more than real!

bAMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
Ah, it feels like it. I make snowmen during winter's snow flower festival in Aldebaran. The snowman who look like legendary four brothers and sisters.

bQMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
I make the snowman with magical snow flower during the festival and add magic with snow flower so it does not get melt during the period.

bgMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
Do you wish to participate in collecting magical snow flower?

cQMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
For winter snow flower festival, collect 10 magical snow flower from snow boy all over the continent.

cgMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
Bind the magical flower to make snow flower bouquet and add magic into it to make it not melt.

cwMmBA.en: Hey, Marine! We need carrots too.

dwMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
ah... did you hear? Snowmans are saying they need the carrots.

eAMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
From Snow boy, bring ^0000CD10^000000 Magical Snow Flowers and a Carrot.

eQMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
ah, you seems to be busy? It is all right. everyone is busy during winter!

egMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
Hello? Did you bring the magtical snow flower?

ewMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
Wow... look at the shining light... seems to be beautiful like real snow isn't it?

fAMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
I will make snow flower bouquet by adding snow flower magic to make it bigger and does not melt.

fQMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
Tada~~~ snow man with magical power~~ snow flower bouquet!!

fwMmBA.en: This snow flower looks more beautiful.

gAMmBA.en: I love the carrots. love the snow flower even more.

ggMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
Snow flower bouquet became stronger with strength of magical snow flower. We wish to share the power but which power you would like to receive?

gwMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
^0000CDSnow^000000
Recover HP 5%, increase HIT+30 for 10 minutes

hAMmBA.en:
^0000CDPestie^000000
Recover HP 5%, increase attack speed for for 10 minutes
(Decrease delay for 10% after attack)

hwMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
Oh, you should not sit but stand still to receive the power.

iAMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
Snow have you heard?

iwMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
And this is the souvenir for the festival. Please take it. The festival continues till end of the month so come back to make snow flower bouquet!

jAMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
Winter, have you heard?

jwMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
Pestie, have you heard?

kAMmBA.en:
[arine the snow flower illusionist]
Flora, have you heard?

kQMmBA.en:
[Flora]
I love the snow flower, it is beautiful!

kgMmBA.en: I love the snow flower, it is beautiful!

kwMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
hmmm.. this is not enough. We need at least 10 magical snow flowers to make snowmen that don't melt during festival period.

lAMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
Bring ^0000CD10^000000 Magical Snow Flowers and a Carrot. Get these from snow boy.

lQMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
You will collect magical flower again?

lgMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
Get snow boy all over the continent for winter snow flower festival.

lwMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
^From snow boy, ^0000CD10^000000 Magical Snow Flowers. Ah, do not forget bringing a Carrot!

mAMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
Chilly feeling is not disappeared from snowman. It will be okay before the dawn.

mQMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
Then, it means to come back after the dawn right~ see you!

mgMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
^From snow boy, collect ^0000CD10^000000 Magical Snow Flowers. Ah, do not forget a Carrot as well!

mwMmBA.en:
[Marine the snow flower illusionist]
Snow flower illusionist who researched snow for 300 years, the Marine! It is fantastic!

nQMmBA.en: Show beautiful snow to kid at where does not have any snow~

ngMmBA.en: Send a warm cotton clothes to kid at cold area~

nwMmBA.en:
[Coti]
Your bag seems so heavy. isn't it? It seems you are carrying it for long time...

ogMmBA.en:
[Coti]
I am snow flower kid Coti from Aldebaran!

owMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
I am snow flower kid Ulsi from Aldebaran!

pAMmBA.en:
[Coti]
We are collecting ^0000CDwarm coton^000000! Please donate it!

pQMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
Those warm cotton will be sent to where does not have snow and used for decorating, or used for making cotton clothes at cold area!

pgMmBA.en:
[Coti]
Please show us your love! We prepared some gift for you!

qAMmBA.en:
[Coti]
Hello! Adventurer! Are you going to donate warm cotton? We will give you a gift!

qgMmBA.en: No I am just looking it.

qwMmBA.en:
[Coti]
Thank you~ You just need to get ^0000CD10 units^000000 of Warm Cotton! Then we will give you a gift!

rAMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
Hey Coti! You need to explain how to get the cotton!

rgMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
You can get the cotton from hunting white-colored monster or fluffy monster.

sAMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
Those 5 monsters are where to get the cotton!

sQMmBA.en:
[Coti]
You can hunt anything you want. They all will drop the cotton!

swMmBA.en:
[Coti]
Alright! Just remember us and please give us the cotton when you get it. We will give you a gift.

tAMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
Share the warm cotton to kids.

tQMmBA.en:
[Coti]
Adventurer! Did you collect the cottons?

tgMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
Why don't we simply check it?

uAMmBA.en:
[Coti]
You must donate them, right? Then we are going to give you a gift!

uQMmBA.en:
[Coti]
Thank you so much! Kids at where does not snow can decorate with snow due to your effort.

ugMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
And kids at cold area can wear a warm cotton clothes.

uwMmBA.en:
[Coti]
You can donate until end of this month so I will also wait for you tomorrow!

vAMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
We need more Warm Cotton. Minimum donation quantity is ^0000CD10 units^000000.

vQMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
Adventurer? Are you coming to donate Warm Cotton again? You can get the cotton from hunting white-colored monster or fluffy monster.

vgMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
Those 5 monsters is where you get the cotton!

wAMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
Are you coming to donate the cotton?

wQMmBA.en:
[Coti]
Thank you so much but you came here so early. We are packing up the donated cotton now.

xAMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
So please come back after dawn!

xQMmBA.en:
[Coti]
Show beautiful snow to kid that does not have any snow~

xwMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
Send a warm cotton clothes to kid at cold area~

yQMmBA.en: We are looking for someone who has high agility and patience!

ygMmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
Your bag is full. It's seems so heavy. I recommend you to make some space in it.

zQMmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
I am snow flower kid Twinkle from Aldebaran!

zgMmBA.en:
[Bling]
I am snow flower kid Bling from Aldebaran!

zwMmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
To celebrate the festival, We will give a special gift if you collect ^0000CDsnow festival card^000000! YEAH!!!!!

0gMmBA.en:
[Bling]
Wondering about the word card? Twinkle! please explain it!

0wMmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
Again? Alright... Aldebaran resident got acrisis due to magical Siroma, but have a new start by Heroes' effort.

1AMmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
To celebrate defeat of Siroma and new start of Aldebaran, We bring a magical gift box from Lutie and give it to everyone at evey snow flower festival.

1QMmBA.en:
[Bling]
To reach our love to 4 of sisters and brothers who saved Aldebaran.

1gMmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
If you find a gift box while hunting, you must open it! That must be full of gift.

1wMmBA.en:
[Bling]
One more thing! Sometimes you can find Snow Flower Card Envelope in the box, and you will get a various word card if you open the envelope.

2AMmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
If you collect the word card by matching a lucky word that we are going to present, then we will give you a special gift.

2QMmBA.en:
[Bling]
We prepared a small event to make the festival more interesting. If you participate 5 times, then we will give you a special hat, Let It Snow!

3AMmBA.en: I will come back after I look around.

3QMmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
Then... Now we are going to present a lucky word today! what do we get?

3wMmBA.en:
[Bling]
You need to bring a word card ^0000CDW. I. N. T. E. R  total 6 cards^000000. Don't miss even just 1 word!

4QMmBA.en:
[Bling]
You need to bring a word card ^0000CDS. N. O. W total 4 cards^000000. Don't miss even just 1 word!

4wMmBA.en:
[Bling]
You need to bring a word card ^0000CDF. E. S. T. I. V. A. L total 8 cards^000000. Don't miss even just 1 word!

5AMmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
^0000CDFLOWER^000000!! Flowers are so beautiful. I LOVE SNOW FLOWERS!

5QMmBA.en:
[Bling]
You need to bring a word card ^0000CDF. L. O. W. E. R total 6 cards^000000. Don't miss even just 1 word!

5gMmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
Sure! Do not forget to open the gift box!

5wMmBA.en:
[Bling]
Once you find a card, do not forget to visit us! Promise!!

6QMmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
If you collect a snow flower festival card, we will give you a special gift! YEAH!!!!!

6gMmBA.en:
[Bling]
It seems adventurer collected all word card!!

6wMmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
Let me check the word card!

7QMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
You came here at right time! Then we will give you a gift.

7gMmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
Enjoy the festival and please bring the word card tomorrow again. PROMISE ME!!

7wMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
Oh! oh! wait!!! You need to give the snow flower festival hat!

8AMmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
Oh yes!!!! almost forgot!! Here is the festival hat. See you tomorrow!

8QMmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
Hum.... It seems some words are missing, so we cannot complete the lucky word.

8gMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
The lucky word is....! ^0000CDWINTER!! You need to collect a word card W. I. N. T. E. R, total 6 cards ^000000.

8wMmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
You can find the word card from Snow Flower Card Envelope inside of your gift box!

9QMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
The lucky word is....! ^0000CDSNOW!! You need to collect a word card S. N. O. W, total 4 cards^000000.

9gMmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
You can find the word card from Snow Flower Card Envelope inside of Your Gift Box!

+AMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
The lucky word is....! ^0000CDFESTIVAL!! You need to collect a word card F. E. S. T. I. V. A. L, total 8 cards^000000.

+gMmBA.en:
[Ulsi]
The lucky word is....! ^0000CDFLOWER!! You need to collect a word card F. L. O. W. E. R, total 6 cards^000000.

+wMmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
Hello, Adventurer! Do you want to participate the snow flower word card game today?

/AMmBA.en:
[Bling]
He must come here for it!!!

/wMmBA.en:
[Bling]
You need to collect a word card ^0000CDW. I. N. T. E. R, total 6 cards^000000. Don't miss even just one card!

AAQmBA.en:
[Bling]
You need to collect a word card ^0000CDS. N. O. W, total 4 cards^000000. Don't miss even just one card!

AQQmBA.en:
[Bling]
You need to collect a word card ^0000CDF. E. S. T. I. V. A. L, total 8 cards^000000. Don't miss even just one card!

AgQmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
^0000CDFLOWER^000000!! Flower are so beautiful. I LOVE SNOW FLOWERS SO MUCH!

AwQmBA.en:
[Bling]
You need to collect a word card ^0000CDF. L. O. W. E. R, total 6 cards^000000. Don't miss even just one card!

BAQmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
Adventurer, It's too early to come.

BQQmBA.en:
[Bling]
Adventurer, You can check the lucky word once a day.

BgQmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
This event is for once a day only.

BwQmBA.en:
[Bling]
So please come back after dawn!

CAQmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
We will prepare the lucky word for you!

CQQmBA.en:
[Twinkle]
I don't envy Lutie in winter. Because we have snow flower festival at Aldebaran!

CwQmBA.en:
[Bling]
Children at cold area do not cry. Because they are waiting for a gift.

DAQmBA.en: If you don't like a taste of the ice candy, please come and see me. I will exchange it to snow flower festival gift box.

DQQmBA.en:
[Snow]
WOW! I have so many things in the bag. Could you please make some space?

DgQmBA.en:
[Snow]
Hello! If you don't like a taste of ice candy or don't know what to do, please come and see me!

DwQmBA.en:
[Snow]
I will exchange the candy to a snow flower festival gift box!

EAQmBA.en:
[Snow]
Do you want to exchange Ice Candy to Snow Flower Festival Gift Box?

EQQmBA.en:
[Snow]
I will exchange 3 ^0000CDice candy to 1 gift box^000000!

FAQmBA.en:
[Snow]
How many gift boxes do you want me to exchange? I can exchange a ^0000CDmaximum of 10 boxes^000000 at once.

FQQmBA.en:
[Snow]
Yeah, Ice candy is much better, right? But there are so many good things in the gift box, so come and exchange it if you are fed up with the candy.

FgQmBA.en:
[Snow]
Well, I understand you want to exchange it as much as you can, but I can exchange a maximum of ^0000CD10 units^000000at once.

FwQmBA.en:
[Snow]
Exchange... Huh? Wait a second, you don't have enough Ice Candy! I can exchange 3 ^0000CDice candy to 1 gift box^000000!

GAQmBA.en:
[Snow]
Could you please count the ice candy again?

GQQmBA.en:
[Snow]
Here we have {} snow flower festival gift boxes! If you get a bunch of the ice candy, please come to exchange it again!

GgQmBA.en:
[Snow]
Huh? ME TOO!! I LOVE THE ICE CANDY SO MUCH! Even I get frozen sometimes.

GwQmBA.en:
[Snow]
But there are so many good things in the gift box, so come and exchange it if you are fed up with the candy.

HAQmBA.en:
[Snow]
Have you ever eaten an ice candy? It's sweet and salty at the same time, and also so cold because of the ice crystal inside of the candy. You must try it! You are going to get frozen!

HgQmBA.en: Have you ever heard miracle story made by eager of snow? You can check out at Aldebaran snow flower festival!

HwQmBA.en:
[Festival PR agent]
Festival area is really cold, so we recommend to participate only verterans who has enough experience to control the cold. So pity...

IAQmBA.en:
[Festival PR agent]
Hello! How are you doing in long winter? Winter is cold but very romantic season.

IQQmBA.en:
[Festival PR agent]
Are you looking forward to seeing snow? I feel so happy even just looking it!

IgQmBA.en:
[Festival PR agent]
Have you ever heard snow flower festival at Aldebaran? how about miracle story made by eager of snow?

IwQmBA.en:
[Festival PR agent]
Now, Aldebaran is doing snow flower festival.

JAQmBA.en:
[Festival PR agent]
Why don't you enjoy romantic winter at Aldebaran? I can bring you to there right now!

JQQmBA.en: I want to go there right now!

JwQmBA.en:
[Festival PR agent]
Then, Happy winter with the festival at Aldebaran!

KAQmBA.en:
[Festival PR agent]
Alright! I hope you to keep remembering snow flower festival at Aldebaran every time winter comes!

KQQmBA.en:
[Festival PR agent]
Have you ever heard miracle story made by eager of snow? You can check out at Aldebaran snow flower festival!

KwQmBA.en: Give me a candy. Ice candy. Candy... Candy, please.

LQQmBA.en: Oh no! It's not what I wanted!!!

LwQmBA.en: Don't you feel so good when you see a snowman? All round... So cute.

MAQmBA.en: The snow flower kids are really doing well this year.

MQQmBA.en: Of course. They practiced so many times to be a snow flower kid.

MgQmBA.en: It doesn't look like snowing at all.

MwQmBA.en: Hey, are you still waiting for snow? You'd better go to Lutie if you really want to see snow.

NAQmBA.en: There is freezing! I almost frozed to death.

NQQmBA.en: Huh? Snow is freezing, of course! Did you thought it must be warm?

NwQmBA.en: Isn't it hot? How can you wear the costume in this weather?

OAQmBA.en: You don't know the meaning of snowman for the residents of Aldebaran.

OgQmBA.en: Let's go to catch the snow boys. I have to farm magical snow flowers!

PQQmBA.en: I should take a break before I packing these cotton. Where is my ice candy?

PgQmBA.en: The quality of warm cotton is quite nice this year! Every sheep must be well-nourished.

QQQmBA.en: No! Don't take any hair from my cuttie! This sheep is one of my family!!!

QwQmBA.en: Let's run for snow flower kids next year.

RQQmBA.en: This hat is really warm and pretty! Why don't we commercialize this?

RgQmBA.en: This is festival gift. We are not supposed to sell it.

SAQmBA.en: It looks like I need more gift boxes.

SQQmBA.en: How many gift boxes do I need to prepare more?

TAQmBA.en: Does anyone want to exchange X for A?

TgQmBA.en: W card, got it. I card, T card... NO!!! I don't have R card! Please sell me R card!

UAQmBA.en: Wow~ It really looks like snowing!

UwQmBA.en: I'm begging for cards... Please show your mercy on me...
